author: ShadyTidus
install_msg:
Thanks for installing ShadyGiveaway!

Use `/giveaway create` to start a giveaway.
Winners must claim prizes by clicking Yes within the timeout period.
Use `/giveaway list` to see active giveaways.
name: ShadyGiveaway
short: Advanced giveaway system with prize codes and claim verification
description: A comprehensive giveaway system with prize code management, claim verification via Yes/No buttons, automatic rerolls on timeout/decline, role requirements, and multiple winner support. Winners must actively claim prizes within a timeout period or the prize is rerolled to the next participant.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores user IDs for giveaway participants, winner data, and timestamps. Data is automatically cleaned up when giveaways end.
